distinct
from T_CUST_CONTRACT
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into T_CUST_CONTRACT (FID, FCREATETIME, FCREATEUSERID, FLASTUPDATETIME, FLASTMODIFYUSERID, FPAYWAY, FARREARAMOUNT, FLINKMANNAME, FLINKMANPHONE, FLINKMANMOBILE, FLINKMANADDRESS, FCONTRACTBEGINDATE, FCONTRACTENDDATE, FAPPLICATION, FCUSTID, FDEPTID, FIDDISCOUNT, FCONTRACTSUBJECT, FREGICAPITAL, FBEFORECONTRACTNUM, FCONTRACTNUM, FGOODSNAME, FCUSTCOMPANY, FCONTACTID, FPREFERENTIALTYPE, FRECONDATE, FINVOICDATE, FRESULTDATE, FCONTRACTSTATUS) values (#{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fpayway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{farrearamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{flinkmanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flinkmanphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flinkmanmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flinkmanaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcontractbegindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fcontractenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fapplication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcustid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fdeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fiddiscount,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fcontractsubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fregicapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbeforecontractnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcontractnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fgoodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcustcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fcontactid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fpreferentialtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frecondate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{finvoicdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fresultdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fcontractstatus,jdbcType=CHAR})

mapper.update:
update T_CUST_CONTRACT
FID = #{record.fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCREATETIME = #{record.fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FCREATEUSERID = #{record.fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLASTUPDATETIME = #{record.flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLASTMODIFYUSERID = #{record.flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

FARREARAMOUNT = #{record.farrearamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLINKMANNAME = #{record.flinkmanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLINKMANPHONE = #{record.flinkmanphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

FCONTRACTBEGINDATE = #{record.fcontractbegindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FCONTRACTENDDATE = #{record.fcontractenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FAPPLICATION = #{record.fapplication,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCUSTID = #{record.fcustid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FDEPTID = #{record.fdeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FIDDISCOUNT = #{record.fiddiscount,jdbcType=CHAR},
FCONTRACTSUBJECT = #{record.fcontractsubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FREGICAPITAL = #{record.fregicapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FBEFORECONTRACTNUM = #{record.fbeforecontractnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCONTRACTNUM = #{record.fcontractnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FGOODSNAME = #{record.fgoodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCUSTCOMPANY = #{record.fcustcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCONTACTID = #{record.fcontactid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FPREFERENTIALTYPE = #{record.fpreferentialtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRECONDATE = #{record.frecondate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FINVOICDATE = #{record.finvoicdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FRESULTDATE = #{record.fresultdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FCONTRACTSTATUS = #{record.fcontractstatus,jdbcType=CHAR},

update T_CUST_CONTRACT set FID = #{record.fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FCREATETIME = #{record.fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCREATEUSERID = #{record.fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLASTUPDATETIME = #{record.flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLASTMODIFYUSERID = #{record.flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FPAYWAY = #{record.fpayway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FARREARAMOUNT = #{record.farrearamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLINKMANNAME = #{record.flinkmanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLINKMANPHONE = #{record.flinkmanphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLINKMANMOBILE = #{record.flinkmanmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLINKMANADDRESS = #{record.flinkmanaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONTRACTBEGINDATE = #{record.fcontractbegindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCONTRACTENDDATE = #{record.fcontractenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FAPPLICATION = #{record.fapplication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCUSTID = #{record.fcustid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FDEPTID = #{record.fdeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIDDISCOUNT = #{record.fiddiscount,jdbcType=CHAR}, FCONTRACTSUBJECT = #{record.fcontractsubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FREGICAPITAL = #{record.fregicapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBEFORECONTRACTNUM = #{record.fbeforecontractnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONTRACTNUM = #{record.fcontractnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FGOODSNAME = #{record.fgoodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCUSTCOMPANY = #{record.fcustcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONTACTID = #{record.fcontactid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FPREFERENTIALTYPE = #{record.fpreferentialtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRECONDATE = #{record.frecondate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FINVOICDATE = #{record.finvoicdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FRESULTDATE = #{record.fresultdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FCONTRACTSTATUS = #{record.fcontractstatus,jdbcType=CHAR}

update T_CUST_CONTRACT
FCREATETIME = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FCREATEUSERID = #{fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FLASTUPDATETIME = #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLASTMODIFYUSERID = #{flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update T_CUST_CONTRACT set FCREATETIME = #{fcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCREATEUSERID = #{fcreateuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLASTUPDATETIME = #{flastupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLASTMODIFYUSERID = #{flastmodifyuserid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FPAYWAY = #{fpayway,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FARREARAMOUNT = #{farrearamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FLINKMANNAME = #{flinkmanname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLINKMANPHONE = #{flinkmanphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLINKMANMOBILE = #{flinkmanmobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLINKMANADDRESS = #{flinkmanaddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONTRACTBEGINDATE = #{fcontractbegindate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCONTRACTENDDATE = #{fcontractenddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FAPPLICATION = #{fapplication,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCUSTID = #{fcustid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FDEPTID = #{fdeptid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FIDDISCOUNT = #{fiddiscount,jdbcType=CHAR}, FCONTRACTSUBJECT = #{fcontractsubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FREGICAPITAL = #{fregicapital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FBEFORECONTRACTNUM = #{fbeforecontractnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONTRACTNUM = #{fcontractnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FGOODSNAME = #{fgoodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCUSTCOMPANY = #{fcustcompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONTACTID = #{fcontactid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FPREFERENTIALTYPE = #{fpreferentialtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRECONDATE = #{frecondate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FINVOICDATE = #{finvoicdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FRESULTDATE = #{fresultdate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FCONTRACTSTATUS = #{fcontractstatus,jdbcType=CHAR} where FID = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select
,t_org_department.fstandardcode as fdeptidStandardcode from T_CUST_CONTRACT join t_org_department on t_org_department.fid = T_CUST_CONTRACT.fdeptid where fcustid = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND T_CUST_CONTRACT.fcontractstatus<>0 AND T_CUST_CONTRACT.FID IN(select c1.fid from t_cust_contract c1 where c1.fcustid = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and trunc(c1.FCONTRACTBEGINDATE) <= (SYSDATE+1/48) minus select er.fid from t_cust_contract er inner join t_cust_contractoperatorlog lo on er.fid = lo.fcontractid where lo.fcreatetime = (select min(lo1.fcreatetime) from t_cust_contractoperatorlog lo1 where lo1.fcontractid = er.fid) and lo.fapprovalstate = '3' and er.fcustid = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and trunc(er.FCONTRACTBEGINDATE) <= (SYSDATE+1/48) union select c2.fid from t_cust_contract c2 where c2.fcustid = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and trunc(c2.fcontractbegindate) <= (SYSDATE+1/48) and c2.fpreferentialtype = 'MONTH_SEND' and c2.fpayway = 'NOT_MONTH_END') AND T_CUST_CONTRACT.FID IN( select c1.fid from t_cust_contract c1 where not exists (select fid from t_cust_contract where fid = c1.fid and fcontractstatus = 1 and fcontractbegindate > (SYSDATE+1/48)) minus select c.fid from t_cust_contract c inner join t_cust_contractoperatorlog l on c.fid = l.fcontractid where c.fcontractstatus = 2 and l.fapprovalstate = 3 and l.fcreatetime = (select min(fcreatetime) from t_cust_contractoperatorlog where fcontractid = c.fid))

select
,t_org_department.fstandardcode as fdeptidStandardcode from t_cust_custbasedata join t_cust_contract on t_cust_custbasedata.fid = t_cust_contract.fcustid join t_org_department on t_org_department.fid = T_CUST_CUSTBASEDATA.Fdeptid where t_cust_contract.fid = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select
,t_org_department.fstandardcode as fdeptidStandardcode from T_CUST_CONTRACT join t_org_department on t_org_department.fid = T_CUST_CONTRACT.fdeptid where T_CUST_CONTRACT.fid = #{fid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
